verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
I long to serve You Lord,I long to walk Your way
I long to heed your words,You're the Potter I'm the clay.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
So many times I have seen,so many times I have felt
Holy blood on the cross You have shed,
Your love and your grace for my soul.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I will open up my heart,I'll praise You with all of my strength
I will seek You all of my days,I will follow all of Your ways.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Shout the news now to everyone,Hope is here Peace has come,
Every debt has been repaid,Broken heart can be remade.
